input.sentences: there was a bike race going on .
lining up for the beginning of the race .
this guy had a crate on his bike for water .
quick stop for a beautiful view .
the police were there to keep things under control .
output.sentences: I've waited a long time for this bike trip.
So many people came to ride in this race today.
It's nice so people are so willing to do this for charity.
And, along the way, we see some beautiful sites.
We are well guarded by the police department.
